param.name: server_type
param.doc: The type of the specified resource server junction. Valid values are "vhj" for a virtual junction or "standard" for a standard junction. Defaults to standard if not specified.

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieve a list of all API Access Control Resources.
method.doc: To retrieve a list of all API Access Control Resources with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the API Access Control resource URI.
Note that prior to running this web service the Verify Access administrator credential must be stored using the Store the Verify Access administrator credentials web service.
Note that if the resource server junction type is virtual host then the server_type=vhj query string parameter must be set.
